1) 40 1A A0 00
0	10000000 	00110101010000000000000
2^0 *	2^(128-127) *	1 + 2^-3 + 2^-4 + 2^-6 + 2^-8 + 2^-10
= 2.416015625


2) 40 1A A0 00 00 00 00 00
0 	10000000001	1010101000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
2^0 *	2^(1025-1023) *	1+ 2^-1 * 2^-3 * 2^-5 * 2^-7
= 6.65625


3) 6.65625 
6 = 110 = 1.10 *2^2
2+127 = 129 = 10000001
	.65625
1 	.3125
0	.625
1	.25
0	.5
1	.0

0100 0000 1101 0101 0000 0000 0000 0000
40 D5 00 00


4) 6.65625 
6 = 110 = 1.10 *2^2
2+1023 = 1025 = 10000000001
	.65625
1 	.3125
0	.625
1	.25
0	.5
1	.0

0100 0000 0001 1010 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
40 1A A0 00 00 00 00 00


5a) 26.125 and 0.4150390625
	.125		.4150390625
0	.25	0	.830078125
0	.5	1	.66015625
1	.0	1	.3203125
		0	.640625
		1	.28125
		0	.5625
		1	.125
		0	.25
		0	.5
		1	.0

26.125		= 11010.001
0.4150390625 	= 0.0110101001


5b) 26.125 + 0.4150390625 = 26.5400390625
11010.001 + 0.0110101001 = 11010.1000101001
Or
	.5400390625
1	.080078125
0	.16015625
0	.3203125
0	.640625
1	.28125
0	.5625
1	.125
0	.25
0	.5
1	.0

26.5400390625 = 11010.1000101001


6) 11010.1000101001 = 1.10101000101001 * 2^4
4 + 127 = 131 = 10000011
0100 0001 1101 0100 0101 0010 0000 0000
41 D4 52 00


7) 11010.1000101001 = 1.10101000101001 * 2^4
4 + 1023 = 1027 = 10000000011
0100 0000 0011 1010 1000 1010 0100 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
40 3A 8A 40 00 00 00 00


8a) 1313.3125 and 0.1015625
.3125 			.1015625
0	.625		0	.203125
1	.25		0	.40625
0	.5		0	.8125
1	.0		1	.625
			1	.25
			0	.5
			1	.0

1313.3125 = 10100100001.0101
0.1015625 = 0. 0001101


8b) 1313.3125 + 0.1015625 = 1313.414063
10100100001.0101 + 0. 0001101 = 10100100001.0110101


9) 10100100001.0110101 = 1.01001000010110101 * 2^10
10 + 127 = 137 = 10001001
0100 0100 1010 0100 0010 1101 0100 0000
44 A4 2D 40


10) 10100100001.0110101 = 1.01001000010110101 * 2^10
10 + 1023 = 1033 = 10000001001
0100 0000 1001 0100 1000 0101 1010 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
40 94 85 A8 00 00 00 00


11a) 2345.34375 and 2345.3984375
	.34375			.3984375
0	.6875		0	.796875
1	.375		1	.59375
0	.75		1	.1875
1	.5		0	.375
1	.0		0	.75
			1	.5
			1	.0

2345.34375 = 100100101001.01011
2345.3984375 = 100100101001.0110011


11b) 2345.34375 - 2345.3984375 = -0.0546875
	.0546875
0	.109375
0	.21875
0	.4375
0	.875
1	.75
1	.5
1	.0
-0.0546875 = -0.0000111


12) -0.0000111 = -1.11 * 2^-5
-5 + 127 = 122 = 01111010
1011 1101 0110 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
BD 60 00 00


13) -0.0000111 = -1.11 * 2^-5
-5 + 127 = 122 = 01111010
-5 + 1023 = 1018 = 01111111010
1011 1111 1010 1100 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000
BF AC 00 00 00 00 00 00
